con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.OMS_NEW_ASSURANCE_NUMBER, EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.BIRTH_DATE FROM EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT INNER JOIN EMIAS_CLUSTER.ATTACHMENT ON EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.PATIENT_ID = EMIAS_CLUSTER.ATTACHMENT.PERSON_INSURANCE_CODE INNER JOIN EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU ON EMIAS_CLUSTER.ATTACHMENT.LPU_ID = EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU.ID INNER JOIN EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU_DEPARTMENT ON EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU.ID = EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU_DEPARTMENT.LPU_ID INNER JOIN EMIAS_CLUSTER.MEDICAL_EMPLOYEE_JOB_INFO ON EMIAS_CLUSTER.MEDICAL_EMPLOYEE_JOB_INFO.DEPARTMENT_LPU_ID = EMIAS_CLUSTER.LPU_DEPARTMENT.ID WHERE EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.IS_POLICY_VALID = 1 AND EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.OMS_NEW_ASSURANCE_NUMBER IS NOT NULL AND EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.BIRTH_DATE IS NOT NULL AND EMIAS_CLUSTER.ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_END_DATE IS NULL AND EMIAS_CLUSTER.MEDICAL_EMPLOYEE_JOB_INFO.JOB_END_DATE IS NULL

con:testStep.name: Записать ОМС и ДР в свойства кейса

con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT OMS_NEW_ASSURANCE_NUMBER, BIRTH_DATE FROM EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT WHERE EMIAS_CLUSTER.PATIENT.IS_POLICY_VALID = 0 AND OMS_NEW_ASSURANCE_NUMBER IS NOT NULL

con:testStep.name: Записать ОМС и ДР в свойства кейса

con:config.con:query: select ip.appointment_id, ip.patient_id, c.position_nom_code, c.hash, COALESCE(c.complaints,'null') as "complaints" from inquiry_purpose.inquiry_purpose ip inner join inquiry_purpose.complaints c on c.inquiry_purpose_id = ip.id where c.hash is not null and ip.patient_id is not null and c.position_nom_code is not null order by random() limit 1
